description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file from a suspicious domain
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Some legitimate apps use this, but limited.
name: Suspicious Download From File-Sharing Website Via Bitsadmin
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\bitsadmin.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"bitsadmin.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \/transfer\ *" OR "*\ \/create\ *" OR "*\ \/addfile\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*.ghostbin.co\/*" OR "*.hastebin.com*" OR "*.paste.ee*" OR "*anonfiles.com*" OR "*cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/*" OR "*ddns.net*" OR "*gist.githubusercontent.com*" OR "*mediafire.com*" OR "*mega.nz*" OR "*paste.ee*" OR "*pastebin.com*" OR "*pastebin.pl*" OR "*pastetext.net*" OR "*privatlab.com*" OR "*privatlab.net*" OR "*raw.githubusercontent.com*" OR "*send.exploit.in*" OR "*sendspace.com*" OR "*storage.googleapis.com*" OR "*transfer.sh*" OR "*ufile.io*"))
